name: Dead Commando Shoot
description:
Waking into the dead room, face to face with hundreds of bloodthirsty zombies, you are really stuck in hell! This’s not a nightmare, keep calm and do not despair! You’re a legend, you’re a death shooter. The powerful weapons in your hand, let the dead target die again!

FEATURES
• Realistic 3D graphics
• Visual and Special Effects
• First Person Shooter Game
• Hundreds of missions
